website_summaries.verdict: Good option for anyone with small to midsize property who prefers the lightweight, eco-friendly design of a battery-powered model.
pros: Easy for most consumers to use, thanks to lightweight build and battery-powered operation
Charges quickly, which helps compensate for fairly short battery life per charge
cons: Telescopic shaft doesn't always stay in a locked position, causing it to shorten during use

customer_reviews.title: I'm crazy in love with this trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I'm crazy in love with this trimmer. I'm a petite 5' tall senior so the gas trimmers are out of the question for me. I have 3 acres of gardens and edges. Lots of trimming. This trimmer has made my gardening life a joy! Thanks Husqvarna for this amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P.

customer_reviews.title: Super light. Well built. Fully adjustable for 99% of people.
customer_reviews.text: I own about 40 or so gas powered Husqvarna pro saws and leafblowers. Got this for the wife and kids. Great product. Super light. Adjustable handle and adjustable overall length. Same battery as my 320ib blower. Great power. Works great in ECO mode as well. I would definately buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Great product but old battery
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer works great on my 1 acre property. Battery lasts just long enough to complete it including some very thick weeds and grass . My only complaint is with the seller sending me a unit that had a battery that was two years old . I can’t help but wonder if the battery would be more than sufficient if it was new .
customer_reviews.author: Sally Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: Say goodbye to gas and oil mix ! This weed eater is impressive. Charger is quick and putting the handle on was a breeze. I'll probably buy the other tools that go with the 40V battery pack. My first use on an 1/2 acre lot and I used only 1 bar of battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be lighter weight than my old gasoline weed eater, but it weighs about the same. It a powerful, long-lasting machine. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Burkhalter

customer_reviews.title: I Cannot Recommend This Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Sept 2019 and used once. Got it out in May 2020 and the battery will not charge. After perusing reviews for the BLi20 battery at the Husqvarna website, this is a known problem with many disgruntled customers. I reached out to all of the Husqvarna dealers in my local area and none of them will honor the warranty unless I had purchased the unit from them. There is a serious design issue with this battery and without warranty support I've got a useless trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery Defective
customer_reviews.text: The battery would not charge. I would recommend charging the battery before you assemble the trimmer. If there is an error code when trying to charge you will have to box it up again for return. The Battery alone is about $159.00. I will buy a Husqvarna gas model.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Edging is a no-go.
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer starts up without hassle, cuts well and is quieter than a gas trimmer. But that's it. I have always used string trimmers to edge and for that purpose it is just about useless. The tiny guard above the spool barely does its job then trimming and allows debris to go just about anywhere. Edging is all but impossible because the handle does not rotate and upside down, the guard becomes even more of a no-show. If I don't maintain an exact cutting angle, I get peppered with debris. While I'm sure that's entertaining to a watch, for serious work this turns out to be a pretty useless machine.
customer_reviews.author: DjangOH

customer_reviews.title: Solid performer for battery operated
customer_reviews.text: No, this is not going to be as good as a gas powered trimmer, however, that being said it performs well, takes down tall weeds just fine, is quiet and the battery lasts about an hour on a full charge. Not too bad at all. Takes about an hour and half to recharge a fully discharged battery. I like to be able to grab it and go to work without needing to fire up a gas machine and go through warm up etc. Perfect for a quick trim area and catching the edges around a mowed area. Would recommend without regrets.
customer_reviews.author: The good, the bad and the ugly

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description, very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Although the description said the battery was included, it was not. It’s very frustrating and time consuming when your item is inaccurate. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: JWY

customer_reviews.title: Great for light yard work
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for it's intended purpose. I have a small yard in town and all I have to is grass near the house and under trees where my mower cannot reach. It is perfect for me. No gas to buy, no yanking on a rope trying to start anyone. I love it. I use it about 10 minutes a week and quick like a bunny, I'm done. I do like the fact that it is adjustable so I don't have to bend over so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jarret D Jones

customer_reviews.title: More like a 3.5, Decent trimmer but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent weed whacker, a little pricey and a bit heavier than some other electric trimmers I've sampled, but it gets the job done. the ECO mode could be better. It cuts grass and small weeds just fine, but not so much against vines and thicker weeds. However, the normal setting is just fine for those. Battery life is long. Aside from the weight, its pretty comfortable to hold and use. Pretty happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Only have used the product once, but so far so good. I cut around 1/2 acre fenced yard and an utility shed and used 1 bar (out of three). Start up and running was a breeze. It appeared to have plenty of power for basic yard stuff. Only thing I still need to do is add string, but like others have stated there are easy videos to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Great garden tool
customer_reviews.text: Have had this a few months now I like it I was used to gas equipment but due to house downscale wanted battery My first greenworks strimmer would not spoil feed this one does very well as it has a bump release feature Battery lasts well good for a hour+ Two power settings I would recommend this heavy duty but light to carry tool I fitted up a shoulder strap as I did not see this as an option
customer_reviews.author: Steady On

customer_reviews.title: Battery Dead
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very happy to receive this quickly but the battery won't charge. Trying to contact Huskvarna/Amazon for the next step and we haven't heard anything as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Danni Belle

customer_reviews.title: wip it good
customer_reviews.text: Husqvarna is a well known name for its products and this product is well made. Only problem with this electric trimmer is the same problem with all electric trimmers, not enough horse power as its counter part the gas powered trimmer. However it has more power than the previous electric trimmers I've used and the battery life is far much better. Would not recommend for heavy use in thick grasses or bermuda but excellent for standard lawn areas, fence lines and light open areas.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. W200

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Piece of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: My stars are based on use from a wheel chair. If I could still stand and ambulate they'd all be five stars. I luv this machine although weight keeps me limited to shorter periods of use. I did deplete the battery once but only after an incredible amount of weed whacking. This machine is well built, a high quality piece of equipment. Worth every penny paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Shumway

customer_reviews.title: always ready to 'whip it good'
customer_reviews.text: Liked the weight, the clean design and its long run time. Edging is not usually a long time investment! The string that comes with the tool does the job but is rapidly worn away. Never-the-less, having used the gas type for years - I'll never go back to gas trimmers again!@
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Note on charger.
customer_reviews.text: Trimmer worked great right out of the box. It's a tad heavy so would be nice to have a harness to help support the weight. One thing to note that wasn't really mentioned and caused me to buy a second charger was that the charging unit provided is 120/240V. 50-60HZ so can be used anywhere in the world. Kind of a pet peeve of mine that North America just seems to ignore or not care about the voltages in the rest of the world. All you need is a suitable plug adapter and you are good to go anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: User friendly machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little machine. I had a batttery operated weed eater before and it was useless. I tried this one and was very pleased. It has power, is light weight, and the battery lasts longer than me. I forgot to turn it off yesterday and the battery ran down but other than that I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Fritts

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool, not just for men but for a woman too. It's light enough to get the job done without having to take a break. The tripod adjust to any height, the battery stays charged for my big yard without getting sluggish. And I do the whole yard, I don't have a lawnmower.
customer_reviews.author: eht75

customer_reviews.title: Excellent electric weed whacker
customer_reviews.text: This battery weed whacker is considerably easier to use than my old corded electric model. I have a large yard (1/3 acre) and the battery lasts several trimmings. After using this model, I'm not sure why anyone except a professional lawn care person would use a gas weed whacker anymore. It's clean and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: SonicAlbert

customer_reviews.title: Efficient Yard Tool
customer_reviews.text: The Husqvarna Battery Driven String Trimmer is a very efficient and effective yard tool. It was purchased as a supplement to an existing gas-powered trimmer but has now pretty much replaced what it was intended to support.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power
customer_reviews.text: I love that the battery lasts so long and it has plenty of power. I swear you think that it's a gas trimmer when your using it. The string seems a bit softer than what I like but I will change it out to something stronger when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Tons of power!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible power. The battery lasts much longer than needed and Husky just plain makes a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but a little heavy for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of battery life and power to do the job. recharging is fast and having a spare battery (expensive) keeps your work going. Easy to use. Wife is not strong enough to hold this for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Balances well, does the job, battery lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: This weedeater is awesome, I feel like it is really well balanced so not bad to hold onto and use for a few hours. I was surprised that the battery lasted well over an hour, I finished my whole backyard and the charger said it was still at 2/3 charge! Its so nice not having to fuss about going to buy gas and then all the fumes when i'm knocking the weeds and tall grass down, super quick and easy to pop the battery in and go!
customer_reviews.author: Nathon Plumlee

customer_reviews.title: Love this weed eater.
customer_reviews.text: This weed eater is really great & so is the battery. I own 1.5 acres & it keeps a charge for the entire time & does a really good job on cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not new so I hope it works
customer_reviews.text: Product seems pretty solid, the one I got appears to be secondhand, so that’s why one star. Thought I was buying new, but got a used item, which is disappointing. The machine feels solid and I hope it works.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: No More Gas!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Battery makes it a little heavy but it is balanced well. Telescoping shaft is great for tall or short people. Battery lasts a lot longer then I could have imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Quality as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and tough. Whipped weeds in the woods and it took even the big stalks down. Battery lasted 2 hours. I needed a break anyways so did not mind. My hands were tingling from the vibration.
customer_reviews.author: MoMo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully. The battery doesn't quite have oomph advertised but it's good enough. You definitely need two batteries to get an acre + lot of tall grass weedwhacked.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: So handy. Only runs when cutting. Good battery life.
customer_reviews.text: No maitenance, always ready to go. Great for small jobs or trimming where my Huskvarna handlebar trimmer canot get.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Walmsley

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Used mainly for edging. Have used once, can’t really comment on battery life; was fine the short period of time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to use (starting up, etc) than the gas trimmer I previously had, and without the maintanense
customer_reviews.author: waltf

customer_reviews.title: Husqvarna has never let me down
customer_reviews.text: Husqvarna devices have always held up great for me. This does a good job. I expect it to meet my needs nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Glen L. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Only for tall people
customer_reviews.text: It is too heavy and not designed for short people to use. It claimed it is lightweight. I ordered it because of the brands reputation. Even the grip bar is too far down the shaft for me to comfortably use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Hassle Starting
customer_reviews.text: Starts with the push of a button. Battery life allows time to finish trimming. Trims very nicely
customer_reviews.author: Alpha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Has plenty of power. Didn't really expect it to do as well as a gas trimmer for edging but performed very well. Husqvarna has the best string feed systems on the market and this model is no exception. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: battery not enough to do basic functions
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this product as it did not do what it is suppose to do. Sometimes it cannot even trim for a few fit before the battery runs on of juice, I have to wait for the battery to recover. Documentation was also bad, not sure what the two buttons are on the device, once is to start no idea what the next button is for.
customer_reviews.author: unmesh redkar

customer_reviews.title: EXCELENT PRODUCT, timming, for the price that i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: EXCELENT PRODUCT, timming, for the price that i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Better than gas
customer_reviews.text: Simple to put together and maintain. Love the battery life and power. Great for general yard care. Better than gas powered for typical home owner use.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kinyon

customer_reviews.title: Product shipped with a bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery would never charge and Husqvarna support is sending me all over town on a wild goose chase. First to a service center that is out of business an next to someone’s house who works on lawnmowers. What a joke. I told them to send me a new battery or I am returning the weed eater to amazon. Still waiting several days later.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd durocher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. I have more than 2/3 battery after doing more than I’ve ever done. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect trimmer for me. Lightweight. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Squier

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: And now standing product works just the way I thought it would the battery life is Great Cuts 2nd to none for a battery powered weed eaters this thing is outstanding
customer_reviews.author: norman woodring

customer_reviews.title: battery life is excellent !
customer_reviews.text: used this trimmer three times and have yet needed to recharge the battery!! still reads fully charged ! would recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: TLW

customer_reviews.title: The battery is no good, even the replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the battery under warranty because it wouldn’t recharge & now the second battery won’t charge. Same thing happened to my other battery trimmer. It took 2+ months to get a replacement. Never again
customer_reviews.author: Gregory R. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Not par with Husqvarna brand - Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Awkwardly balanced. Above average weight. Decent battery run time, as long as you don’t use turbo mode. Not well designed for edging. Due to vibrations, handles could use some padding.
customer_reviews.author: NHS

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Not as powerful as a gas glimmering for my home use it's great
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: So Far, Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer does exactly what was advertised. It has enough power to cut through heavy grass. I have used it three or four times. So far, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: John C Duane

customer_reviews.title: It’s just simply good!
customer_reviews.text: It’s just simply good. No more loud gas weed eater. Been using it for a month now, and I’m super amazed with the battery life, and power.
customer_reviews.author: Lavenderx

customer_reviews.title: Glad I cut the cord,great product.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a month to review this product so that I could use it a few times. I found this trimmer to be of high quality,very well made,and well balanced. I have small gardens and about 75 feet of hedges all bordered by cobble stone,plus I live on a corner lot so I also have lawn strips bordering the sidewalk. After trimming and edging I still had battery power left and I didn't use half of the line on the spool. So far ,so good.
customer_reviews.author: henry l carreau

customer_reviews.title: Same as gas power
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly powerful, have owned battery weed whackers in the past and this is an improvement, gets the same stuff as my gas power.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Better than a gas edger.
customer_reviews.text: Really worth the price! Nice quality. It would be nice if it had a roller for edging.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: The best battery trimmer I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: The best part of this product is the speed control. Run it in Eco mode and you will never bog it down in tall grass as the speed controller adds more power when needed. I love this trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hoffpauir

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use this trimer for edging and trimming of a cemetary. Its light weight and battery life makes the job easier than a gas trimer. Huskvarna stands behind there products, I have used them for years without issue.
customer_reviews.author: DALE Poland

customer_reviews.title: Product does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Cuts right thru heavy weeds with ease. Battery life is good. Recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: Roy R Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really handy, works better than my old Still one which has cord.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Parker

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to handle.
customer_reviews.text: After assembly the trimmer started and worked well in high grass.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D. Rosenstiel

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this trimmer. The battery charges quickly and lasts long enough to trim the lawn and the pasture fence. Ergonomically well designed.
customer_reviews.author: El Diablo Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great; light and easy to handle. The battery is long lasting and recharges quickly. The only disappointment is it takes longer to trim because of the lack of power.
customer_reviews.author: wanda woodby

customer_reviews.title: It holding up without breaking down like the gas product.
customer_reviews.text: So far the product is doing the job, front and back yard with no problem using one battery. I will see how far it will go of holding up with out breaking down.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great trimmer!! Its as heavy as a regular trimmer but completely worth it!! It takes care of a 1/2 acre of trimming with battery life still left!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm tired of trimming before the battery runs down.
customer_reviews.text: It's not heavy. It cuts better than most corded electric trimmers and much quieter than a gas powered trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I can't find anything this thing can't chew through.
customer_reviews.author: Annette G

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised. My yard is tall weeds every summer here in Colorado. This thing went through them like a hungry bear. Recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Thomasson

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Like its variable speed, ease of use, and light weight
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charger
customer_reviews.text: This item requires a charger and is advertised it comes with one. I did not receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Parkhill

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Performs well and starts easily. Sturdy cutting line is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Connie M. Inman

customer_reviews.title: Splendid piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Well balanced powerful and easy to use for a smaller person. My wife loves it .
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Buy one you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about it,the battery last alot longer than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: My little corded electric one worked fine, but now I don't have to drag 200' ...
customer_reviews.text: I weedeated my 2/3 acre today. It took me 1/2 as long as usual. My little corded electric one worked fine, but now I don't have to drag 200' of cord through the trees and rocks. And this one cuts the tall rough grass that my corded one wouldn't go through. It turns on every single time, immediately, with just a touch. Worked perfectly. And it's fairly light and quiet. All I can say about not having to use my @#$%* gas weedeater anymore is that with this one I did not utter one single cuss word - not one - the entire time. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie J

customer_reviews.title: Decent tool poor guidance for new users
customer_reviews.text: It is easy enough to use but the owner’s manual does not enough a lot of guidance to new weedwacker user/owners.
customer_reviews.author: Kessie

customer_reviews.title: I took photos as I unpacked it because the package ...
customer_reviews.text: I took photos as I unpacked it because the package had been loosely taped and no packing was in the box. The Husqvarna box inside had been forced open with some cardboard still under the staples and a new staple sloppily applied. It made me nervous about the product inside. The inside looks OK so I will not send it back unless it gives me a problem. I will return to update my review. when I have had a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tallyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew needed this to trim my sister's yard. Works great! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: laflin

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life does the job great
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life, a bit heavy weight. Works awesome does the job.
customer_reviews.author: D&D

product_meta.title: Husqvarna Battery Straight Shaft String Trimmer 115iL
product_meta.description: Lightweight, comfortable & easy to use 40V battery powered 14-in. Grass trimmer. Perfect for trimming lawns, edges or smaller areas of higher, tougher grass or weeds. Featuring an efficient Brushless electric motor with save mode, intuitive keypad, Instant start & a telescopic shaft for easy height adjustments. The low noise level allows you to work without disturbing the surroundings. 4Ah battery & charger are included. Run longer, stronger, lighter.
feature_bullets: Save mode allows you to maximize your run time by allowing the motor to work more efficiently
Brushless electric motor has an innovative design to deliver high efficiency and maximizes run time while extending life of the tool. Battery voltage - 36.5 V
The telescopic shaft makes it easy to adjust the products length to find a comfortable working position and provides for easy storage/transport
Sound pressure level at operators ear: 77 decibels(A) .Ideal for cutting lawn edges or smaller areas of tougher / higher grass and comes with a 2-year Warranty
The generous 14-in. Cutting Swath makes it easy to accomplish a lot of work in a short amount of time

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars193 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
